title: "What is the connection between numerology and Franz Anton Mesmer's school of magnetism?"
first_phrase: In this text, the concepts of numerology are discussed, which are integral to Franz Anton Mesmer's school of thought. They were taken from an anonymous work titled "Nouvelle Découverte sur le Magnétisme Animal," with additional insights provided by Baron Du Potet, who interpreted the magnetic tradition. The text combines Mesmer's interpretations of symbols based on his knowledge of esotericism with techniques derived from Zoroastrian initiation practices, known for their power since ancient Persian times. The section also recommends reading "Mesmerismus," another work on personal magnetic power. Lastly, it lists additional works on magnetism, including Baron Dupotet's "Cours de magnétisme en sept leçons" and the "Découverte du véritable secret du magnétisme animal."
